div.p: SEE IF YOU CAN FIND ANYONE.
I'LL BE IN THE BRIEFING ROOM.
GOOD. I WANT YOU ALL TO
I MET A MAN I ADMIRED.

p.span: TO SEE YOU ON THE BRIDGE.

div.p: I CAN FIND NOTHING AT ALL
I KNOW THIS IS GOING TO
ALL OF US WHO WENT DOWN
OF THE SHIP SEEMS TO ME
I DID NOT SAY YOU WEREN'T
THAT IS FOR ANY NORMAL VULCAN
I JUST NEED A WEE BIT
YES, I SPOKE TO YOU. I SAID
THAT YOU CAN LEAVE, TOO, NOW.
I FIND WHEN I WAKE UP?
KEEP ME POSTED AS TO CHEKOV.
I THOUGHT I WAS OVER YOU.
I WANT TO TALK ABOUT US.
I'D HOPED FOR A FEW WORDS
IF I MAY SAY SO, SIR,
WE HAVE A DUE DATE AT
WHY EACH ONE OF MY COMMANDS
AS GOOD AN ANSWER AS ANY,
Spock: LET IT READ THAT THIS
I HAVE HAD TO RESORT TO
I EXPECT IT TO BE OBEYED.
YES. A SLIP OF THE TONGUE.
IF YOU WOULD LEAVE THE ROOM
WHEN THERE'S WORK TO BE DONE.
AND I AM OF FLAG RANK,
YOU STAB ME IN THE BACK
HAVE TO LOOK AT YOU AGAIN.
I MADE A FOOL OF MYSELF
AND HE WAS SCARED TO DEATH.
IF I COULD TALK TO THEM,
I'VE GOT TO GET UP THERE.
WHAT AM I GOING TO DO?
